title: Not getting Kayn mission
body: Is anybody else not getting the Kayn mission after a week or two of it being out? I still haven't gotten mine yet and was wanting the icons.

replies.body: Those Kayn missions are only available to those who currently own Kayn already. Since the missions are tied to that champion specifically, it would be a little hard to complete them without first being able to play as him. Once Kayn goes F2P however, everyone will be able to complete the missions.
